get.description: Lists the endpoints that agents may call as part of Dev Box service administration. These FQDNs should be allowed for outbound access in order for the Dev Box service to function.

200.description: The operation was successful. The response contains a list of outbound network dependencies.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

SkuListResult.description: Results of the Microsoft.DevCenter SKU list operation.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of results if there are any.

PoolUpdateProperties.description: Properties of a Pool. These properties can be updated after the resource has been created.

devBoxDefinitionName.description: Name of a Dev Box definition in parent Project of this Pool

networkConnectionName.description: Name of a Network Connection in parent Project of this Pool

licenseType.description: Specifies the license type indicating the caller has already acquired licenses for the Dev Boxes that will be created.

localAdministrator.description: Indicates whether owners of Dev Boxes in this pool are added as local administrators on the Dev Box.

stopOnDisconnect.description: Stop on disconnect configuration settings for Dev Boxes created in this pool.

singleSignOnStatus.description: Indicates whether Dev Boxes in this pool are created with single sign on enabled. The also requires that single sign on be enabled on the tenant.

healthStatus.description: Overall health status of the Pool. Indicates whether or not the Pool is available to create Dev Boxes.

healthStatusDetails.description: Details on the Pool health status to help diagnose issues. This is only populated when the pool status indicates the pool is in a non-healthy state

devBoxCount.description: Indicates the number of provisioned Dev Boxes in this pool.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the resource.

HealthStatus.description: Health status indicating whether a pool is available to create Dev Boxes.

message.description: A message describing the issue, intended to be suitable for display in a user interface

LocalAdminStatus.description: Local Administrator enable or disable status. Indicates whether owners of Dev Boxes are added as local administrators on the Dev Box.

SingleSignOnStatus.description: SingleSignOn (SSO) enable or disable status. Indicates whether Dev Boxes in the Pool will have SSO enabled or disabled.

StopOnDisconnectConfiguration.description: Stop on disconnect configuration settings for Dev Boxes created in this pool.

status.description: Whether the feature to stop the Dev Box on disconnect once the grace period has lapsed is enabled.

gracePeriodMinutes.description: The specified time in minutes to wait before stopping a Dev Box once disconnect is detected.

StopOnDisconnectEnableStatus.description: Stop on disconnect enable or disable status. Indicates whether stop on disconnect to is either enabled or disabled.

PoolListResult.description: Results of the machine pool list operation.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of results if there are any.

PoolUpdate.description: The pool properties for partial update. Properties not provided in the update request will not be changed.

properties.description: Properties of a pool to be updated.

id.description: Image ID, or Image version ID. When Image ID is provided, its latest version will be used.

exactVersion.description: The actual version of the image after use. When id references a gallery image latest version, this will indicate the actual version in use.

CatalogResourceValidationErrorDetails.description: List of validator error details. Populated when changes are made to the resource or its dependent resources that impact the validity of the Catalog resource.

errors.description: Errors associated with resources synchronized from the catalog.

NetworkConnectionUpdate.description: The network connection properties for partial update. Properties not provided in the update request will not be changed.

properties.description: Properties of a network connection resource to be updated.

NetworkConnectionUpdateProperties.description: Properties of network connection. These properties can be updated after the resource has been created.

subnetId.description: The subnet to attach Virtual Machines to

domainUsername.description: The username of an Active Directory account (user or service account) that has permissions to create computer objects in Active Directory. Required format: admin@contoso.com.

domainPassword.description: The password for the account used to join domain

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the resource.

healthCheckStatus.description: Overall health status of the network connection. Health checks are run on creation, update, and periodically to validate the network connection.

networkingResourceGroupName.description: The name for resource group where NICs will be placed.

NetworkConnectionListResult.description: Result of the network connection list operation.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of results if there are any.

startDateTime.description: Start time of last execution of the health checks.

endDateTime.description: End time of last execution of the health checks.

healthChecks.description: Details for each health check item.

status.description: The status of the health check item.

displayName.description: The display name of this health check item.

startDateTime.description: Start time of health check item.

endDateTime.description: End time of the health check item.

errorType.description: The type of error that occurred during this health check.

recommendedAction.description: The recommended action to fix the corresponding error.

additionalDetails.description: Additional details about the health check or the recommended action.

HealthCheckStatusDetailsListResult.description: Result of the network health check list operation.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of results if there are any.

value.description: The collection of outbound network dependency endpoints returned by the listing operation.

OutboundEnvironmentEndpointCollection.description: Values returned by the List operation.

category.description: The type of service that the agent connects to.

endpoints.description: The endpoints for this service for which the agent requires outbound access.

OutboundEnvironmentEndpoint.description: A collection of related endpoints from the same service for which the agent requires outbound access.

domainName.description: The domain name of the dependency. Domain names may be fully qualified or may contain a * wildcard.

description.description: Human-readable supplemental information about the dependency and when it is applicable.

endpointDetails.description: The list of connection details for this endpoint.

EndpointDependency.description: A domain name and connection details used to access a dependency.

port.description: The port an endpoint is connected to.

EndpointDetail.description: Details about the connection between the Batch service and the endpoint.

Schedule.description: Represents a Schedule to execute a task.

ScheduleUpdate.description: The schedule properties for partial update. Properties not provided in the update request will not be changed.

properties.description: Properties of a schedule resource to be updated.

type.description: Supported type this scheduled task represents.

frequency.description: The frequency of this scheduled task.

time.description: The target time to trigger the action. The format is HH:MM.

timeZone.description: The IANA timezone id at which the schedule should execute.

state.description: Indicates whether or not this scheduled task is enabled.

ScheduleProperties.description: The Schedule properties defining when and what to execute.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the resource.

ScheduleListResult.description: Result of the schedule list operation.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of results if there are any.

ScheduledType.description: The supported types for a scheduled task.

ScheduleEnableStatus.description: Schedule enable or disable status. Indicates whether the schedule applied to is either enabled or disabled.

NetworkConnectionName.name: networkConnectionName
NetworkConnectionName.description: Name of the Network Connection that can be applied to a Pool.

ScheduleNameParameter.name: scheduleName
ScheduleNameParameter.description: The name of the schedule that uniquely identifies it.

FilterParameter.name: $filter
FilterParameter.description: The filter to apply to the operation. Example: '$filter=contains(name,'myName').
